trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função do Active Directory em um ambiente de hospedagem do Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the ActiveDirectoryRole is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o ActiveDirectoryRole é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: Funções do Active Directory geralmente correspondem a uma função de trabalho, o título ou a habilidade de trabalho dentro do contexto da organização.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções que se reportam a função atual, direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: GetAllReports returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetAllReports retorna todos os nós abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>para retornar somente os nós que estão diretamente abaixo do nó atual.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções que seja direta ou indiretamente de relatório para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções que se reportam diretamente a função atual.

trans-unit.source: GetDirectReports returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetDirectReports retorna apenas os nós que estão diretamente abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar todos os nós abaixo do nó atual usar <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções de relatório diretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção genérica que contém todos os <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objetos associados com a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma função pode ser um conjunto geral de objetos de segurança.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use GetEntries to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Dessa forma, uma função pode conter várias identidades, por exemplo usar GetEntries para retornar todos os objetos de diretório associados à função.

trans-unit.source: The generic <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> collection that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genérica <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> que está associada com a atual coleção <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista genérica das contas do Windows NT associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetIdentities obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: GetIdentities obtém todos os <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objetos associados a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>e converte cada um em um valor de cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica de valores que representam as contas do Windows NT associadas a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre o Gerenciador do atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManager returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManager retorna o gerente direto para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar todas as funções acima do nó atual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o Gerenciador da função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre a cadeia gerencial associada atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManagerialChain returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManagerialChain retorna todos os nós acima da função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar apenas o gerente direto da função atual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a cadeia gerencial associada à função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório são supervisionados pelo Gerenciador do atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>retornado contém informações de todos os objetos gerenciados pelo Gerenciador dessa função, mas não contém essas informações da função atual.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório que são supervisionados pelo Gerenciador do atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista genérica de <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objetos associados com a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetSecurityIdentifiers checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetSecurityIdentifiers verifica cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>retornado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A>método para verificar se a entrada possui um identificador de segurança no seu <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>coleção.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, GetSecurityIdentifiers adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>tem a propriedade, GetSecurityIdentifiers adiciona um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>à lista que ele retorna.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica de <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objetos associados com a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Como uma função é uma generalização de um ou mais objetos, várias identidades podem ser descritas por uma única função.

trans-unit.source: Use IncludesIdentity to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Use IncludesIdentity para testar se uma identidade especificada foi incluída dentro dessa função.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A identidade que deseja pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that identity is included in the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para indicar que identity está incluído no ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Use o nome para descrever a função.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó raiz do Active Directory associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: A entrada raiz é a função a cadeia de funções que não tem gerente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> que representa o nó raiz do Active Directory associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>permite que esse objeto a ser serializado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para popular com dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>destino desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
